person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Speaking in Arabic , Mills made a final statement before an anonymous citizen flipped the switch that sent 2000 volts of electricity through his body , said Department of Corrections spokesman Eugene Morris , who was present at the execution .

Let's think step by step.

1. Mills
2. Department of Corrections spokesman (Eugene Morris)
3. Anonymous citizen.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
|--------|
| Mills |
| Eugene Morris |
| anonymous citizen |
